PHRASE.LANG: This cone-headed creature will be all eyes for you! It runs, swims in the air around your head, and sits on your shoulder for a rest. [#Legal]
Cette tête de cône vous obéira au doigt et à l'oeil! Six Clopes court, nage dans les airs autour de votre tête, et s'assied sur votre épaule pour se reposer. [#Legal]
Dieser kleine Geschöpf wird Sie nie verlassen! Es läuft, schwimmt in der Luft um den Kopf, und sitzt auf der Schulter.[#Legal]
Questa creatura dalla testa conica terrà tutti gli occhi per te! Corre, nuota in aria ed attorno alla tua testa e si siede sulla tua spalla per riposare. [#Legal]
Esta criatura irresistible Nunca te dejaré! Tres Occi corre, nada en el aire, y se sienta en su hombro para descansar. [#Legal]
This cone-headed creature will be all eyes for you! It runs, swims in the air around your head, and sits on your shoulder for a rest. [#Legal]
This cone-headed creature will be all eyes for you! It runs, swims in the air around your head, and sits on your shoulder for a rest. [#Legal]
